name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Profile analyzer and contacts by Ercess Live

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Profile analyzer and contacts by Ercess Live

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ercess Live has brought this amazing chrome extension to you that serves a purpose of showing he standard analytics data of any influencers.

It gives you following data - 
1. Number of followers
2. Average likes per post
3. Average comments per post
4. Engagement rate
5. Engagement rate of 12 recent individual posts
6. Average video views
7. Followers and following ratio
8. Like and comment ration

If you want to hire Ercess Live to run your next influencer marketing campaign, please contact us - www.ercess.com.

Our USP:
1. Barter and paid both types of collaborations available. Our barter collaboration starts from Rs.100 per influencer
2. Ercess Live can offer with multiple small screen actors and actresses
3. We enable the physical shoot also, like promotion on stores etc. influencers can travel to desired locations
4. Hire influencers from metro, tier 1 and tier 2 cities
